title: Microsoft | L63 | Hyderabad | ACCEPTED
content:
Education: Tier 1 Btech CSE
Years of Experience: 7.5 YOE
Current : 60L Base + 10L bonus + 10L stocks= 80LPA (Working in UK)

Date of the Offer: December 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L63
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: Base 50 LPA
Signing Bonus: 3L + 2L (1st, 2nd years)
Stock bonus: 130K USD (Over 4 years ) - 27.5L per year
Bonus: 0-30 % =7.5L (Considering 15% avg)
Relocation - 5L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Joining): 88L (1st year), 87L (2nd year)
Benefits: Microsoft India perks


Is this a good offer for ~7.5 YOE for SSE, I feel like I have been lowballed on joining and stock bonus.
